name: .JCD File Extension
summary: Learn about .JCD files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open a JCD file in JewelCAD (Windows). Additionally, you can use JewelCAD to export your JCD file as an STL file. To export a JCD file as an STL file, select Misc → Cut in Slices → Also Output STL file.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
